name: Roblox Battlefield!
description:
WHEN BETA IS REACHED, I'LL START DEVELOPMENT ON A NEW ROBLOX GAME, AND WITH THE DEVELOPMENT OF THAT GAME, I'LL ALSO UPDATE ROBLOX BATTLEFIELD UNTIL IT REACHES FINAL RELEASE VERSION.

CHECK OUT THE DEVELOPMENT BETA GAMEPLAY VIDEO! IT'S IN THE DOWNLOAD LINKS!

______________________________________________________________________________________

I also have a website!

Gobble!

It's a search engine research project that I started (seriously) on New Year's Eve!

Please check it out! I need views to continue the development of the website.

Gobble Version Selector (neocities.org)

______________________________________________________________________________________

ROBLOX Battlefield is a game about fighting, knocking down buildings, and having fun! 

This is my first video game! It was made using a ROBLOX client from Mid-2008.

And I (finally) after 3 or 4 days of development, it's out there for download!

Keep in mind that this is my first game, it is not the best, and that I'm working to improve it.

NOTICE: You'll need NOVETUS, a "multi-roblox client selector" for this to run properly! (Novetus WINDOWS 64  BIT ONLY,  is in the download links)  

Also, it's better with multiplayer! Refer to a YouTube tutorial on how to setup a novetus multiplayer server.

AND BEFORE YOU ASK, Roblox Battlefield is completely safe to play.

ALPHA 1.3 RELEASED!
